FuncDef: The display license resource usage rtu command displays authorization information about the RTU.
CLIs: display license resource usage rtu all
Examples: <HUAWEI> display license resource usage rtu all
FeatureName            Offline     Allocated     Activated     Available     Total
Physical Position    FeatureName     Needed Count    Used Count      Active Status
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To query authorization information about the RTU, run the display license resource usage rtu command.
Precautions
This command applies only to the CR5DLPUFF17R/CR5DLPUFF17Q.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
